name: Mr. Floppy V1
description:
"Mr Floppy System's recovery" is a 2D platformer controlled by a real and physical floppy Disk. You control a little floppy disk struggling to climb up and reboot his memory. You can only Jump (with the Up key) or Dash down (with the Down Key)

° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° HOW DOES IT WORKS ? ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° °

You need a Makey Makey board, 3 electric wires, some copper tape and a floppy disk of course !!! Connect le "mass" of the MM on the metallic part of the floppy disk. On each side of it, tape the wires. When you move the trigger, it should touch de copper tape in order to create an electric field. Then connect the two wires to the Up and Down entry on the MM board. That's all !

° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° STILL IN DEVELOPPEMENT ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° °

V2 is almost there !
- Better feedbacks and explosions
- 3 new levels
- Audio trigger (no more wires and electronics)
